{"id":986290336,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 weeks, 5 days","timestamp":1688490065,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/986290336/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Vowels of a String","memory":"8.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string reverseVowels(string s) {\n        stack<char> vowelsInString;\n        string vowels = \"aeiouAEIOU\";\n        for(int i = 0 ; i < s.size() ; i ++)\n        {\n            if(vowels.find(s[i]) != string::npos)\n            {\n                vowelsInString.push(s[i]);\n            }\n        }\n\n        for(int i = 0 ; i < s.size() ; i ++)\n        {\n            if(vowels.find(s[i]) != string::npos)\n            {\n                s[i] = vowelsInString.top();\n                vowelsInString.pop();\n            }\n        }\n        return s;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-vowels-of-a-string","has_notes":false}
